bioSyntax sample files (for VS Code)

Files included:
- bedExample.bed                (BED)       — UCSC Genome Browser examples
- example.vcf                   (VCF)       — signeR R package example data
- toy.sam                       (SAM)       — samtools example data
- bigPsl.fa                     (FASTA)     — UCSC Genome Browser examples
- bigGenePredExample4.gtf       (GTF)       — UCSC Genome Browser examples
- bigPsl.psl                    (PSL)       — UCSC Genome Browser examples
- example.fastq                 (FASTQ)     — FASTQ format article examples (includes SRA-style read name snippet)

Notes:
- These are small text samples intended for syntax highlighting testing.
- If your VS Code file associations don't trigger highlighting, set language mode manually
  (bottom-right status bar) to BED/VCF/SAM/FASTA/GTF/FASTQ as appropriate.

Sources:
- UCSC Golden Path help examples directory: https://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenpath/help/examples/
- BED example file (bedExample): https://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenpath/help/examples/bedExample.txt
- samtools toy SAM: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/samtools/samtools/develop/examples/toy.sam
- signeR example VCF: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TojalLab/signeR/devel/inst/extdata/example.vcf
- FASTQ examples: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FASTQ_format
